Class CafeteriaController

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.controller.CafeteriaController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/cafeterias") public class CafeteriaController extends Object
The CafeteriaController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing cafeterias.

This controller handles HTTP requests from the frontend and interacts with the service layer to perform CRUD operations on CafeteriaDTO objects.

Supported operations include creation, retrieval (by ID and list), and update of cafeterias.

  • Method Details

    • createCafeteria

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public CafeteriaDTO createCafeteria(@RequestBody CafeteriaDTO cafeteriaDTO) throws BadRequestException
      Creates a new cafeteria based on the provided CafeteriaDTO.
      Parameters:
      cafeteriaDTO - The data of the cafeteria to be created.
      Returns:
      The created cafeteria as a CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if input validation fails or required fields are missing.

    • getCafeteriaById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public CafeteriaDTO getCafeteriaById(@PathVariable("id") Long id) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves a cafeteria by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the cafeteria to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The matching cafeteria as a CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the ID is invalid or null.
      NotFoundException - if no cafeteria is found with the given ID.

    • getAllCafeterias

      @GetMapping @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<CafeteriaDTO> getAllCafeterias() throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of all cafeterias in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all cafeterias as CafeteriaDTO objects.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if a request error occurs.
      NotFoundException - if no cafeterias are found.

    • updateCafeteria

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public CafeteriaDTO updateCafeteria(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody CafeteriaDTO updatedCafeteriaDTO) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Updates an existing cafeteria with the provided updated information.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the cafeteria to update.
      updatedCafeteriaDTO - The updated cafeteria data.
      Returns:
      The updated cafeteria as a CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the cafeteria with the specified ID does not exist.
      BadRequestException - if the request is invalid or contains bad data.
